body:
Finally! After a quiet year, VTK-m v1.6.0 first RC is out  :tada: :tada: :tada:

Exciting new [features](https://gitlab.kitware.com/vtk/vtk-m/-/tags/v1.6.0-rc1) ready to be used.

In addition that, this PR also:

- Adds a release branch in the spack package.
- Sets v.1.5.1 as the preferred version which will be changed after the final 1.6.0 release is out.

Let me know if we need to change anything else in the package

ViB
title: Update vtkm pkg new release
